item.description:
An annual rite of the new season is to cruise through the Snowsports Expo (always in Nov in Boston) to pick up great deals on new gear, check out booths for every ski area in New England, get free stuff and more.  Cost is $12 but a couple of discounts are available.

Last year we had about a dozen skiers and riders that meet at the main entrance and checked out the attractions together.  I ended up buying a snowboard (a Rome powderboard) and others picked up great deals on skis.  After we will likely hit a local bar for drinks.  I will wait at the main entrance at BOTH 4pm and again at 6pm - if you arrive late or get lost we can regroup. I will be at the entrance at 4pm and 6pm with a bright red EMS wind breaker or call 617-596-5579

To see a list of vendors, get a $2 coupon and get more info check out:

http://www.bewisports.com/expos/boston/

Sometimes Groupon or other discount sites will run deals for discounts to this event so please add a comment if you see a better deal.  Also if you have a particular interest at the Expo make a comment so we have an idea of what people are looking for  ex. "need to pick up new skis and check out the Jay Peak booth".
